grails.plugin.springsecurity.web

Class SecurityRequestHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • grails.plugin.springsecurity.web.SecurityRequestHolder

  • public final class SecurityRequestHolder
extends Object
    Uses a ThreadLocal to store the current request and response.
    Author:
    Burt Beckwith
